name: Forever (Nicholas Duxbury)
description:
This game is based on a piece of artwork called "Tukulagi tukumuitea" AKA "Forever and ever" by John Pule with elements from his other work blended together. In the game the player moves through the painting using methods similar to a platformer and navigates between "islands" using vines.

Music by Klankbeeld

[Controls]

w,a,s,d or arrow keys.

Esc to quit to desktop.

there is no jump.

Don't worry if you fall off you will be spawned on the last island you touched.

I would really appreciate any feedback you have to make this experience better!
